reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt comfortable, soft, and well-fitting, with one noting it looks brand new after several washes. They appreciate its quality and color, with one mentioning its lovely shade of cream. The size receives mixed feedback - while some find it true to size, others note the collar is ridiculously huge. The fabric quality also gets mixed reviews.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Casual Luxury
items.body: I love this Varley sweatshirt! It is thick, soft, and very well made. I purchased the Ivory color and it is stunning (not bright white and not beige...i didn't want either of those). I can imagine this will last for years; it washes beautifully and still looks brand new after several washes (no pilling). The fit is designed to be really roomy; for reference, I typically wear a 1X and I purchased the XL and it fit me just fine. It fits me roomy across the midsection and snug at the waist and perfect across the chest (for reference, I'm a 40DD). It is very thick and warm. I live in Florida, so I will not be able to wear it again until October most likely, but I plan to purchase a black version of this next fall/winter (maybe they'll make one with silver zips next season?). Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Darling with jeans
items.body: I love Varley. This top is somewhat basic in its color and style but has just enough pops of style with the gold zipper and oversized collar to make it special. It runs very large. I recommend sizing down or you might feel swallowed….I’m 5.8” and bought XS. Read more
items.author: SoCalmom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy Pullover
items.body: Love this pullover! I get so many compliments on it! Obviously more expensive but worth it because the quality is amazing. Read more
items.author: Destiny Alfonso

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pullover!
items.body: Great shirt! Love the fit and color! Very cozy and has held up with washing and drying it many times! True to size. Looks just like lulu lemon! Read more
items.author: Julie Gironda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size down and you will love it
items.body: This is worth the money. It is thicker, so for cooler weather. Varley is one my go to brands bc they are so well made. They truly quality. I have had several items from them for years and they still look brand new. This does run very big. I normally wear Med and I bought one in small and one is extra small. They both fit. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars WRONG ITEM SENT
items.body: I was so excited to receive this item as it is my favorite pullover. I have it in other colors and know it fits perfectly. When this item finally arrived, Shopbop had sent me the complete wrong item. I received some bathing suit instead of the $158 pullover. I now have to wait 48hours for a response from Shopbop in order to receive my refund. SOOO disappointed. Read more
items.author: Jdubu826

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality just runs very large
items.body: Very good quality. Just runs very big. Size down Read more
items.author: csl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have in 3 colors
items.body: Love Varley and have this top in 3 colors (just ordered black on Amazon). I was excited to see the price slightly lower here than a boutique close by. I love the material and the elevated casual look of these. The gold zipper is also a win for me! I am 5’ 6” and 170lbs and ordered. Medium and the fit is perfect for me. Read more
items.author: Jordan

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Sapphire, Blush Tan, Egret, Oatmeal Marl, Ivory, Mushroom, Grey Marl, Black, Deep Charcoal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
